author: James Crump, James Crump
title: Coronavirus: Medical Navy ship pulls into Manhattan harbour to help fight against virus
description: 'We are going to fight every way we can to save every life that we can'
content:
A Navy hospital ship carrying 1000 beds and 1200 medical personnel has arrived in New York City to help combat the coronaviruspandemic.
The USNS Comfort arrived in Manhattan on Monday and will treat those who need non-coronavirus related care.
The ship will… [+1694 chars]
